camel.source.endpoint.newRemotePath.name: camel.source.endpoint.newRemotePath
camel.source.endpoint.newRemotePath.description: New path on Atmos when moving files

camel.source.endpoint.remotePath.name: camel.source.endpoint.remotePath
camel.source.endpoint.remotePath.description: Where to put files on Atmos

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.source.endpoint.secretKey.name: camel.source.endpoint.secretKey
camel.source.endpoint.secretKey.description: The secret key to pass to the Atmos client (should be base64 encoded)

camel.component.atmos.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.component.atmos.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.atmos.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.atmos.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.component.atmos.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.atmos.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.atmos.uri.name: camel.component.atmos.uri
camel.component.atmos.uri.description: The URI of the server for the Atmos client to connect to

camel.component.atmos.fullTokenId.name: camel.component.atmos.fullTokenId
camel.component.atmos.fullTokenId.description: The token id to pass to the Atmos client

camel.component.atmos.secretKey.name: camel.component.atmos.secretKey
camel.component.atmos.secretKey.description: The secret key to pass to the Atmos client (should be base64 encoded)

camel.component.atmos.sslValidation.name: camel.component.atmos.sslValidation
camel.component.atmos.sslValidation.description: Whether the Atmos client should perform SSL validation
